description: Gold evaluation dataset for bones-search: 110 work items across 10 domains with labeled duplicate pairs and relevance-annotated queries.

items.title: OAuth token refresh fails with timeout error
items.description: Users report that OAuth token refresh requests time out after 30 seconds. The token endpoint becomes unresponsive, forcing repeated logins. Affects Google and GitHub OAuth providers.

items.title: Authentication timeout during login via Google OAuth
items.description: Google OAuth authentication times out after 30 seconds. Token refresh endpoint unresponsive, causing repeated login prompts. Same issue affects GitHub OAuth provider.

items.title: Implement role-based access control for project permissions
items.description: Add RBAC permission model so project owners can assign roles (viewer, editor, admin) to team members. Roles control which operations each user can perform.

items.title: RBAC permission system for team member roles
items.description: Role-based access control system with project-level permissions. Define viewer, editor, and admin roles. Project owners assign roles to team members to control access.

items.title: Password reset email not delivered to users
items.description: Users report not receiving password reset emails. The forgot-password flow sends a reset link via SMTP but emails are silently dropped. Affects new signups and locked accounts.

items.title: Forgot password link not arriving via email
items.description: Password reset flow broken: reset emails not delivered via SMTP. Forgot-password link silently dropped, leaving users unable to recover locked accounts.

items.title: Two-factor authentication via TOTP
items.description: Implement time-based one-time password (TOTP) for two-factor authentication. Support authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy). Store encrypted TOTP secrets.

items.title: 2FA setup broken for new accounts
items.description: Two-factor authentication enrollment fails for accounts created in the last 7 days. TOTP code rejected even when correct. Affects new user onboarding.

items.title: Audit log for admin permission changes
items.description: Record all admin actions that modify user permissions. Audit log entries should include actor, target user, old and new permissions, timestamp, and IP address.

items.title: Track user permission modifications in audit trail
items.description: Audit trail for permission changes: log admin actions modifying user roles. Each entry stores actor, target user, old permissions, new permissions, timestamp.

items.title: SSO integration with enterprise identity providers
items.description: Support SAML 2.0 and OIDC for enterprise single sign-on. Allow companies to connect their identity provider (Okta, Azure AD, Auth0) for seamless employee authentication.

items.title: SQLite connection pool exhausted under load
items.description: Under concurrent load, all SQLite database connections in the pool are exhausted. New requests queue indefinitely or fail with 'too many open connections'. Happens above 50 concurrent requests.

items.title: Database too many open connections error during concurrent requests
items.description: SQLite connection pool exhausted under concurrent load. Too many open connections error appears above 50 concurrent requests. Pool size needs tuning or requests fail.

items.title: Slow search query on large item datasets
items.description: Full-text search query takes over 2 seconds on datasets with more than 100k items. The FTS5 index may need rebuilding or additional prefix indexes. Affects production deployments.

items.title: Search query timeout with 100k items in database
items.description: FTS5 full-text search times out on large datasets exceeding 100k items. Query takes over 2 seconds, hitting the timeout threshold. FTS5 index rebuild may resolve the issue.

items.title: Implement schema migration for v2 database format
items.description: Design and implement data migration path from v1 to v2 schema. Migration must be reversible, run atomically, and handle partial failures. Support both automatic and manual migration.

items.title: Database schema upgrade path from version 1 to version 2
items.description: Schema migration from v1 to v2 format. Reversible migration that runs atomically with rollback support. Handles partial failure gracefully. Auto-migrate on first run or manual migration.

items.title: WAL file corruption after unexpected crash recovery
items.description: SQLite write-ahead log becomes corrupted after unexpected process crash. Integrity check fails on restart. Need robust crash recovery to repair or rebuild the WAL file.

items.title: Database integrity failure after process crash and WAL recovery
items.description: After crash recovery, SQLite write-ahead log is corrupted. Database integrity check fails on restart. WAL repair or rebuild required for crash recovery.

items.title: Add composite index on event timestamp and item_id
items.description: Add a composite SQLite index on (item_id, wall_ts_us) to speed up event replay queries. Current full-table scans are O(n) and slow for large event logs.

items.title: Query performance regression after adding new column to items table
items.description: Adding a new column to the items table caused a query performance regression. All queries that previously used an index now do full table scans. Likely a missing index.

items.title: Backup and restore for project databases
items.description: Implement bn backup and bn restore commands for project database snapshots. Backup should be atomic, include all event logs and projection databases.

items.title: Terminal color output garbled on Windows console
items.description: ANSI color escape codes not rendered correctly on Windows terminal. Output appears with raw escape sequences like ESC[32m instead of colored text. Affects Windows 10 and Windows Terminal.

items.title: CLI colors broken with ANSI escape codes in Windows terminal
items.description: ANSI color escape codes displayed as raw text on Windows. Windows terminal shows ESC[32m instead of rendering colors. Windows 10 and Windows Terminal both affected.

items.title: Add progress indicator for long-running operations
items.description: Show a spinner or progress bar during long-running operations like sync, rebuild, and search indexing. Prevents confusion when commands take more than 2 seconds.

items.title: Spinner animation during slow CLI commands
items.description: Display a spinner animation for commands that take longer than 2 seconds (sync, rebuild, indexing). Progress indicator reassures users that the command is still running.

items.title: Dark mode color theme for TUI interface
items.description: Add a dark mode color theme to the ratatui TUI. Colors should use a dark background palette with appropriate contrast ratios for accessibility.

items.title: Configurable color theme for terminal user interface
items.description: Allow users to configure color themes in the terminal UI. Support dark mode palette with high contrast. TUI colors configurable via config file.

items.title: Table layout overflows with long item titles in TUI
items.description: Items with titles longer than 80 characters overflow the TUI table layout. The overflow wraps text incorrectly or truncates without indication. Need proper text truncation with ellipsis.

items.title: Long titles cause text wrapping issues in list view
items.description: TUI list view incorrectly wraps text for titles over 80 characters. Table columns overflow, causing misaligned rows. Text should be truncated with ellipsis when too long.

items.title: Add keyboard shortcuts for TUI navigation
items.description: Add vim-style keyboard shortcuts (j/k for up/down, g/G for top/bottom, / for search) to the TUI. Shortcuts should be configurable and displayed in a help panel.

items.title: Hotkeys and keybindings for item navigation in terminal UI
items.description: Keyboard shortcuts for navigating items in the TUI: vim-style j/k navigation, g/G for top/bottom, / to trigger search. Configurable keybindings in config file.

items.title: Improve error message formatting with context
items.description: Error messages lack context. Improve error display by showing the command that failed, the root cause, and actionable hints for resolution. Use colored output for severity.

items.title: Versioned REST API with backward compatibility guarantees
items.description: Design a versioned API (v1, v2) with explicit backward compatibility policy. Breaking changes require a new major version. Clients specify version in Accept header.

items.title: API versioning and stability guarantees for public release
items.description: Public API versioning with backward compatibility: v1, v2 major versions. Breaking changes trigger new major version. Version negotiation via Accept header.

items.title: JSON output format for machine-readable CLI results
items.description: Add --json flag to all list and show commands to output machine-readable JSON. Structured output enables scripting and integration with other tools.

items.title: Machine-readable structured output with --json flag
items.description: Support --json flag on list, show, and search commands for machine-readable output. JSON structured output enables scripting and tool integration.

items.title: Rate limiting for bulk import operations
items.description: Apply rate limiting to bulk import commands to prevent overloading the event log. Configurable rate limit with backpressure. Prevents disk I/O saturation during large imports.

items.title: Throttle bulk operations to prevent event log overload
items.description: Rate-limit bulk import commands. Configurable throttle rate prevents overloading the event log and disk I/O. Backpressure mechanism for large-scale bulk imports.

items.title: Paginated output for large item lists
items.description: Implement cursor-based pagination for list commands returning more than 100 items. Returns a cursor token for the next page. Prevents loading entire dataset into memory.

items.title: Cursor-based pagination for large result sets
items.description: Cursor-based paging for list commands: returns next cursor token when results exceed 100 items. Avoids loading entire dataset. Pagination for scalable output.

items.title: Deprecate legacy event format in next major release
items.description: Mark the v0 event format as deprecated. Remove support in v2. Provide migration tooling to upgrade existing event logs to v1 format before the cutoff.

items.title: Remove support for old event schema in v2 release
items.description: Drop legacy event format support in v2. v0 schema deprecated and removed. Migration tool converts old event logs to v1 format before v2 cutoff.

items.title: Document public API surface with examples
items.description: Write comprehensive API documentation covering all public commands, flags, and output formats. Include worked examples for common workflows. Publish as web docs and man pages.

items.title: Flaky integration test in event replay suite
items.description: The event replay integration test fails intermittently (about 1 in 20 runs). Failure mode: assertion on event order after concurrent writes. Likely a timing-dependent race condition.

items.title: Intermittent test failure in CI pipeline for event ordering
items.description: Flaky test in event replay integration suite: fails about 1 in 20 CI runs. Failure is a race condition in concurrent write ordering. Timing-dependent intermittent failure.

items.title: Add property-based tests for CRDT merge correctness
items.description: Use proptest to generate random sequences of CRDT operations and verify merge commutativity, associativity, and idempotence. Target 1000 test cases with shrinking.

items.title: Fuzz testing for event replay and CRDT merge logic
items.description: Apply cargo-fuzz to the event replay pipeline and CRDT merge operations. Generate arbitrary event sequences to discover crashes, panics, or merge invariant violations.

items.title: CI build fails on macOS with linker error
items.description: GitHub Actions CI workflow fails on macOS runners with a linker error: ld: library not found for -lsqlite3. The dependency needs to be bundled or the runner needs the Homebrew sqlite package.

items.title: GitHub Actions workflow broken for macOS Apple Silicon builds
items.description: macOS CI build fails with linker error: ld library not found for sqlite3. Homebrew sqlite dependency missing on Apple Silicon runner. Needs bundled sqlite or CI runner fix.

items.title: Test coverage below 80% threshold in core module
items.description: bones-core has 72% line coverage, below the 80% target. The uncovered paths are in error handling branches and the event replay edge cases. CI coverage check fails.

items.title: Increase unit test coverage for bones-core to meet 80% threshold
items.description: bones-core test coverage at 72%, below 80% CI threshold. Missing coverage in error handling and event replay edge cases. Add targeted unit tests to meet coverage target.

items.title: Simulation harness for concurrent agent operations
items.description: Build a deterministic simulation harness that replays agent operations concurrently. Used to verify CRDT merge correctness and find race conditions under controlled conditions.

items.title: Deterministic multi-agent simulation for testing concurrent operations
items.description: Deterministic simulation harness for concurrent agent operations. Replays agents operations to test CRDT correctness and race conditions under controlled, repeatable conditions.

items.title: Add microbenchmarks for search and FTS query performance
items.description: Add criterion.rs benchmarks for FTS5 search queries at various dataset sizes (1k, 10k, 100k items). Track performance regression across changes. Benchmark runs in CI nightly.

items.title: Performance regression test for full-text search queries
items.description: Criterion benchmarks for FTS search at 1k, 10k, 100k item scales. Regression testing for query performance. CI nightly benchmark run to detect FTS performance degradation.

items.title: CLI startup time too slow on large repositories
items.description: bn command takes 3+ seconds to start on repositories with more than 10k items. Profiling shows projection loading is the bottleneck. Need lazy loading or incremental startup.

items.title: Slow initialization: CLI takes 3 seconds with 10k items
items.description: CLI startup latency: 3 seconds on 10k item repositories due to projection loading. Lazy loading or incremental startup required. Profiling confirms projection load is bottleneck.

items.title: Memory usage grows unboundedly during sync operation
items.description: Memory usage increases without bound during long sync operations. After syncing 1M events, RSS exceeds 2GB. Likely a memory leak in the event replay loop buffer.

items.title: Memory leak in event replay loop causes OOM during sync
items.description: Event replay loop memory leak during sync. RSS grows unboundedly past 2GB when replaying 1M events. Memory not freed between replay batches. OOM killer terminates process.

items.title: Implement lazy loading for item detail views
items.description: Defer loading item descriptions and metadata until the user actually views the item. Reduces initial load time by 60% on large repositories. Prioritize title and status loading.

items.title: Defer item metadata loading until needed to reduce startup latency
items.description: Lazy loading for item metadata: defer description and field loading until viewed. Reduces startup latency 60% on large repos. Only titles and status loaded eagerly.

items.title: In-memory LRU cache for frequent projection queries
items.description: Add an LRU cache in front of the SQLite projection queries. Cache capacity: 1000 items, 60s TTL. Reduces repeated reads for the same items in a TUI session.

items.title: Query result caching with LRU eviction for TUI sessions
items.description: LRU cache for projection query results. Capacity 1000 items with 60s TTL. Reduces repeated SQLite reads during TUI sessions. Cache invalidated on write events.

items.title: Optimize FTS5 index configuration for large dataset queries
items.description: Tune FTS5 index configuration: enable prefix indexes at 2 and 3 chars, increase page size, batch insert mode. Target: sub-100ms search on 100k items.

items.title: FTS5 index tuning for sub-100ms search performance at scale
items.description: FTS5 index optimization: prefix indexes 2-3 chars, larger page size, batch insert for indexing. Goal: sub-100ms search latency on 100k items dataset.

items.title: Profile and reduce memory allocations in the hot path
items.description: Use cargo-flamegraph to profile allocation hot paths during search and event replay. Identify and eliminate unnecessary heap allocations. Target: 50% reduction in allocations.

items.title: Sanitize user input before writing to event log
items.description: Event titles and descriptions are written to the event log without sanitization. Malicious content in titles could cause issues during replay. Validate and sanitize all user input fields.

items.title: Input validation to prevent injection through item titles
items.description: Lack of input sanitization on item titles allows injection in event log entries. User-supplied titles and descriptions need validation before writing to the event log.

items.title: Encrypt sensitive project data at rest
items.description: Project databases and event logs contain sensitive data stored in plaintext. Implement AES-256-GCM encryption at rest using a user-provided or system-managed key.

items.title: At-rest encryption for local project database and event logs
items.description: Encrypt project database and event logs at rest with AES-256-GCM. User-provided or system key management. Sensitive data protected from filesystem-level access.

items.title: Event log tamper detection with cryptographic checksums
items.description: Compute BLAKE3 checksums over event log entries to detect tampering. Verify checksums on read. Alert user if integrity check fails. Prevents silent event log manipulation.

items.title: Verify event log integrity with BLAKE3 hash verification
items.description: BLAKE3 hash verification for event log integrity. Compute checksums over entries, verify on read. Tamper detection alerts if checksum mismatch found. Event log integrity protection.

items.title: Restrict file system access to project .bones directory
items.description: The bn CLI should sandbox all file operations within the project's .bones directory. Prevent path traversal attacks that could read files outside the project scope.

items.title: Sandbox file operations to prevent path traversal outside project
items.description: Sandbox the CLI to only access files within the .bones project directory. Block path traversal attacks. File operations outside the project scope should be rejected.

items.title: Automated dependency vulnerability scanning in CI
items.description: Add cargo-audit to CI pipeline to scan for known vulnerabilities in dependencies. Fail CI on high-severity advisories. Weekly scheduled scan for new CVEs.

items.title: Supply chain security audit for Rust crate dependencies
items.description: Audit all Rust crate dependencies for supply chain security risks. cargo-audit for CVE scanning. Review suspicious crates with broad filesystem or network access.

items.title: Secure token storage for OAuth credentials
items.description: Store OAuth access tokens and refresh tokens securely using the OS keychain (keyring crate). Prevents tokens from being stored in plaintext config files.

items.title: Write contributor guide for new developers
items.description: Create a comprehensive contributor guide covering: development environment setup, code conventions, how to add new event types, testing strategy, and PR process.

items.title: Development workflow documentation for new contributors
items.description: Contributor documentation: development environment setup, code conventions, adding event types, testing strategy, pull request workflow. Guide for onboarding new developers.

items.title: Generate rustdoc API reference for all public interfaces
items.description: Ensure all public functions, structs, and traits have complete rustdoc comments. Generate and publish API reference documentation. Add examples to key public APIs.

items.title: Rustdoc documentation for public API interfaces and structs
items.description: Complete rustdoc coverage for public interfaces. All public functions, structs, traits documented with examples. API reference published from rustdoc output.

items.title: Quickstart tutorial for getting started with bones
items.description: Write a quickstart guide with step-by-step tutorial: installation, project init, creating items, searching, duplicate detection. Includes worked examples and screenshots.

items.title: Getting started guide with examples and installation instructions
items.description: Quickstart guide: installation steps, project initialization, creating and searching items, duplicate detection workflow. Step-by-step tutorial with worked examples.

items.title: Automate changelog generation from commit history
items.description: Use git-cliff or similar to auto-generate CHANGELOG.md from conventional commits. Integrate into release pipeline. Group changes by type (feat, fix, docs, perf).

items.title: Auto-generate release notes from conventional commits
items.description: Automated release notes generation from commit history using git-cliff. Conventional commits grouped by type (feat, fix, perf, docs) for CHANGELOG.md. Part of release pipeline.

items.title: Document CRDT merge semantics and conflict resolution
items.description: Write detailed documentation on the CRDT event model: merge commutativity, conflict resolution rules for concurrent edits, tombstone handling, and causality tracking.

items.title: Explain conflict resolution algorithm for concurrent CRDT edits
items.description: CRDT documentation: merge semantics for concurrent edits, conflict resolution algorithm, tombstone handling, causality tracking. Documents how concurrent agent writes are merged.

items.title: Document architecture and design decisions
items.description: Architecture documentation: high-level system design, crate layout, key design decisions (CRDT choice, event sourcing, projection model). ADR format for major decisions.

items.title: Dockerfile for containerized deployment
items.description: Create a multi-stage Dockerfile for containerized deployment. Build stage uses Rust toolchain; runtime stage is a minimal distroless image. Publish to GitHub Container Registry.

items.title: Containerize application with multi-stage Dockerfile
items.description: Multi-stage Dockerfile: Rust builder stage + minimal distroless runtime. Containerized deployment for Docker environments. Published to GitHub Container Registry.

items.title: GitHub Actions release pipeline for binary distribution
items.description: Automate binary release pipeline using GitHub Actions. Build release binaries for Linux x86_64, macOS arm64, and Windows x86_64. Publish to GitHub Releases on tag push.

items.title: Automate publishing binary releases via GitHub Actions
items.description: GitHub Actions pipeline to publish release binaries. Builds for Linux x86_64, macOS arm64, Windows x86_64. Automated release to GitHub Releases on version tag.

items.title: Cross-compilation for ARM Linux targets
items.description: Add cross-compilation support for aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu and armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf targets. Use cross-rs for builds. Required for Raspberry Pi and ARM server deployments.

items.title: Build ARM aarch64 Linux binaries in CI
items.description: CI cross-compilation for aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu and armv7 ARM targets using cross-rs. Produces ARM Linux binaries for Raspberry Pi and ARM server deployments.

items.title: Homebrew formula for macOS package installation
items.description: Create and maintain a Homebrew formula for macOS installation. Submit to homebrew-core or a custom tap. Formula builds from source or installs pre-built bottles.

items.title: macOS package manager distribution via Homebrew
items.description: Homebrew distribution for macOS. Formula in homebrew-core or custom tap. Install via brew install bones. Source build or pre-built bottle distribution.

items.title: Linux DEB and RPM packages for distribution
items.description: Build Debian (.deb) and RPM packages for Linux distribution. Packages include man pages and shell completions. Publish to a package repository via GitHub Actions.

items.title: APT and RPM package repository for Linux installation
items.description: DEB and RPM packages for Linux. APT repository and RPM repository for distribution. Packages include man pages, shell completions. GitHub Actions publishing pipeline.

items.title: Nix flake for reproducible development environment
items.description: Add a Nix flake to the repository for reproducible development environments. Includes all Rust toolchain dependencies, dev tools, and test dependencies.

items.title: Graceful shutdown on SIGTERM and SIGINT signals
items.description: Handle SIGTERM and SIGINT signals for graceful shutdown. In-progress operations should complete or checkpoint before exit. Prevents data corruption on container stop.

items.title: Clean process termination on interrupt and termination signals
items.description: Graceful shutdown handler for SIGTERM and SIGINT. Completes or checkpoints in-progress operations before exit. Prevents data corruption when container is stopped.

items.title: Configuration file hot reload without restart
items.description: Watch config file for changes and reload settings at runtime without restarting. Uses inotify/kqueue for file change notifications. Applies new config within 1 second.

items.title: Reload project settings at runtime without process restart
items.description: Hot reload configuration: watch config file with inotify/kqueue, apply new settings within 1 second without restart. Runtime config reload for production environments.

items.title: Structured logging with OpenTelemetry tracing
items.description: Add OpenTelemetry distributed tracing to key operations. Emit trace spans for event replay, search queries, and sync operations. Export to Jaeger or OTLP collector.

items.title: Plugin system for custom event handlers and extensions
items.description: Design a plugin API for custom event handlers and workflow extensions. Plugins hook into the event pipeline to trigger actions on item create, update, or status change.

items.title: Extension hook API for agent workflow integrations
items.description: Extension API with hooks into the event pipeline. Plugins trigger on item create, update, status change. Agent integrations use hooks for custom workflow automation.

items.title: Internationalization support for non-English users
items.description: Add i18n support for CLI messages and TUI text. Use gettext or fluent for message catalogs. Initial translations: Spanish, French, German, Japanese.

items.title: Localization for CLI and TUI in multiple languages
items.description: Localization (l10n) for CLI and TUI. Message catalogs for Spanish, French, German, Japanese. gettext/fluent translation system. i18n internationalization infrastructure.

items.title: Adversarial: fix HTML table rendering in web output
items.description: Fix HTML table rendering bugs in the web export output. Table cells with special characters are not escaped. Broken colspan on merged cells. Affects HTML export only.

items.title: Adversarial: fix database table schema for new column
items.description: Fix database table schema to add new column without breaking existing queries. SQLite ALTER TABLE to add nullable column. Schema migration for production databases.
